column4: what's the directory of hda1 so i can put an icon on my desktop? is it /dev/hda1? if so, i can't make a shortcut to the desktop.
/dev/hda1 is the device file for a partition. I'm assuming it's already mounted somewhere. Why do you want it actually?
check your /etc/fstab, /dev/hda1 is probably listed there with the directory it's mounted to
